name: Mahjong Fest: Winterland
description: Go on a puzzle-solving Christmas holiday. Play classic mahjong solitaire game and build a Christmas town!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP or later Processor: 1.0 Ghz Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: 64 mb DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 200 MB available space
recommended_requirements: Memory: 1 GB RAM DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 200 MB available space
